named-query.name: Personage.findAll
named-query.query: select p from Personage p order by p.persName

named-query.name: Personage.findByPersName
named-query.query: select p from Personage p where p.persName = :persName

named-query.name: Clan.findAll
named-query.query: select c from Clan c order by c.clanName

named-query.name: Clan.findByClanName
named-query.query: select c from Clan c where c.clanName = :clanName

named-query.name: AttributeColumn.findAll
named-query.query: select ac from AttributeColumn ac order by ac.idattributeCol

named-query.name: AttributeColumn.findByattributeColName
named-query.query: select ac from AttributeColumn ac where ac.attributeColName = :attributeColName

named-query.name: PersAttCol.findAttributeColumnForPersonage
named-query.query: select pac from PersAttCol pac where pac.personage = :personage and pac.attributeColumn = :attributeColumn

named-query.name: PersAttribute.findAll
named-query.query: select pa from PersAttribute pa order by pa.persAttId

named-query.name: Attribute.findAll
named-query.query: select a from Attribute a order by a.idAttribute

named-query.name: Attribute.findAttributesForColumn
named-query.query: select a from Attribute a where a.attributeColumn = :attributeColumn
